programme.desc: The designers saddle up for a wild ride as their next challenge requires them to create a modern take on western chic.

programme.title: Sandokan: The Pirate Prince
programme.desc: Believing him to be the prophesied leader, the tribe’s chief, Balau, helps Sandokan uncover his past, despite his son Lang’s jealousy. As Sandokan makes progress, he and Marianne confess their love for each other. Yanez argues with Sandokan not to get involved with the Dayak’s struggle and leaves. Sandokan discovers his tribe was massacred under orders from Marianne’s father. The lovers fall out, and Brooke rescues Marianne.

programme.title: The National Dog Show ('20)
programme.desc: From the Kennel Club of Philadelphia, this cherished competition for all dog lovers returns for the 17th year. Hosted by John O'Hurley, the event features 2,000 of the nation's leading canines, including the world’s largest, smallest and most exotic. Over 170 breeds strut their stuff with the hope of becoming this year's top dog. “The Dean” David Frei provides expert show commentary, and Mary Carillo chimes in as an adept sideline reporter for this ultimate canine showdown. But which dog will have their day, and which will leave with their tail between their legs? After all, there can only be one “Best in Show”.

programme.title: Saving My Tomorrow
programme.desc: Through a lyrical mix of science, animation and music, Saving My Tomorrow urges children to take action by highlighting ways in which kids can do their part to save the planet.

programme.desc: It's the hottest day of the year, meaning it's time for the annual multi-day animal holiday, ANIMAS.

programme.title: My Gym Partner's A Monkey S2
programme.desc: When Adam fails yet another 'Feeding Frenzy' exam, Mr. Hornbill hints that he'll be held back if he doesn't pass the next one.

programme.title: Uncle Grandpa S2

programme.title: Uncle Grandpa S2
programme.desc: Uncle Grandpa helps a young girl learn unconventional survival skills that help her fit in with her camping troop.

programme.title: Uncle Grandpa S2

programme.title: Uncle Grandpa S2

programme.title: The Titan Games S1
programme.desc: The competition continues with competitors pushing their bodies to the limit by battling opponents in unforgiving head-to-head challenges, designed by Dwayne Johnson. Winners will advance to the ultimate challenge of Mt. Olympus, the consummate athletic test of speed, strength, agility and endurance. The male and female competitors who conquer Mt. Olympus will become a Titan, and in the end, the Titans return to battle each other. One woman and one man will be crowned Titan Champions. Dwayne Johnson serves as host and Executive Producer, Liam McHugh and Alex Mendez commentate from the skybox and Cari Champion reports from inside the arena.

programme.desc: The Bigfoot legend is turned upside down when a bright young Yeti finds something he thought didn’t exist—a human.

programme.title: Ruby And The Well S1
programme.desc: A wish seems to ask Ruby and the others to take revenge into their hands. Mina stands her ground and refuses. Will Ruby learn something from this?

programme.title: Ruby And The Well S1
programme.desc: In this wish from Emerald’s deep past, Ruby must resolve a family feud and misunderstanding before it’s too late. Meanwhile, the well is threatened.

programme.title: Ruby And The Well S2
programme.desc: Ruby struggles both to save the well and grant the wish of an enemy of the community.

programme.title: Ruby And The Well S2

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda

programme.title: Top Chef S16
programme.desc: “Top Chef” Kentucky begins as fifteen of the country’s finest chefs are off to the races at Churchill Downs for the ride of their lives.

programme.title: Top Chef S16
programme.desc: A very pregnant Gail Simmons asks the chefs to feed her cravings in a special Quickfire delivery. Then it’s time to celebrate two iconic Kentucky mainstays: local cuisine and bourbon. The Chefs head to Makers Mark, the oldest distillery in America to put their spins on a meal full of Kentucky classics including burgoo, Benedictine, mutton, hoe cakes and dumplings. This is a true battle for Kentucky as the chefs navigate their first team challenge – and one chef makes a potentially fatal shopping error. Can they recover or will they be scraping the bottom of the barrel to make it through? Food and travel editor, Nilou Motamed joins the judges this season, and Maker’s Mark’s in-house Chef, Newman Miller, sits on the panel as a guest judge.

programme.title: Top Chef S16
programme.desc: It’s holiday time for Top Chef, and Richard Blais and Brooke Williamson help spread the festive cheer by presenting a white elephant Quickfire challenge. Then, the Chefs receive an unexpected gift as Michelin starred super Chef Eric Ripert sits down with them to celebrate an elaborate traditional French Chrismas dinner. However, once the last bite is taken, Padma informs the Chefs that they’re missing the final part of the tradition of Le Revillon de Noel… the presentation of 13 desserts. It’s a midnight pastry free-for-all as the Chefs try to avoid being on the placed on the naughty list.

programme.title: Top Chef S16
programme.desc: In a massive twist, Padma’s favorite challenge Restaurant Wars comes early this year, but before the chefs gear up for battle, they must first duke it out in an amuse bouche-based Quickfire for Top Chef alum turned James Beard Award winning chefs: Karen Akunowicz and Nina Compton. Then, the gauntlet has been thrown and with twelve chefs remaining, three restaurants will be battling for victory. James Beard Award winning restaurateur Caroline Styne joins as the guest judge along with Nilou Motamed. And if this unexpected chaos isn’t enough, Tom leaves the Chefs breathless with an announcement that will change the course of the competition.

programme.title: Top Chef S16
programme.desc: The mayhem and drama continues of the biggest Restaurant Wars in the history of “Top Chef.” Tom’s announcement of a double elimination piles on even more pressure. “Top Chef” alum turned James Beard Award winning Chefs Karen Akunowicz and Nina Compton join the restaurant crawl along with Nilou Motamed and guest judge and James Beard Award winning restaurateur, Caroline Styne.

programme.title: Divas
programme.desc: This documentary series shows five generations of jet engines. These fighter jets are capable of carrying bombs and soar close to the edge of space. The sixth generation of fighter jets began in 2020, and the 11th season has covered most of the air artillery since then.

programme.title: Divas
programme.desc: In the jungles of a remote archipelago in the South Pacific, a biologist is attempting to do something Charles Darwin and Ernst Mayr never accomplished: catch evolution in the act of creating new species. Albert Uy is on the verge of an amazing discovery in the Solomon Islands, but there's a threat looming on the horizon.

programme.title: Air Warriors S10
programme.desc: Examine the 2002 sniper attacks in Washington D.C. through police audio and video, as well as local and national news reports. The sniper’s three-week reign of terror triggered one of the most intense and complicated manhunts in American history.

programme.title: Air Warriors S10
programme.desc: See the meteoric rise and tragic end of civil rights activist Malcolm X, captured by rarely seen archival footage.

programme.title: Visionaries ft. Keanu Reeves
programme.desc: Witness the story of President Clinton's impeachment, presented through archival footage of the day.

programme.title: Visionaries ft. Keanu Reeves
programme.desc: From their teeth, and claws, to incredible stealth and cunning, nature’s most lethal predators have evolved a staggering array of hunting techniques.

programme.title: Visionaries ft. Keanu Reeves
programme.desc: In this episode we witness nature’s most extraordinary animal migrations, and discover the lengths they must go to, in order to survive.

programme.title: Visionaries ft. Keanu Reeves
programme.desc: Baby Animals: Protecting babies against extreme conditions, hungry predators, and the threat of starvation, all animals must fight for the future of their species.

programme.title: Oceans Africa
programme.desc: It is now June, and the park is bathed in 17 hours of daylight. With the warm temperatures come rich pickings, but for the newborn the summer months are crucial as they learn to fight, find food and avoid predators.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Autumn is when stags compete to breed, osprey chicks begin a 3000-mile migration to West Africa, salmon return to the rivers where they were born and adders give birth to live young.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: The winter is mild and wet, which is good news for some but bad news for others. Red deer are forced to higher ground, salmon have gone six months without food, mountain hares turn a conspicuous white, and squirrels kick their own young out of the nest.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Reptiles, amphibians, insects and fish are found in every corner of our world - and for this special group of animals, life is regulated by the sun.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China

programme.desc: In this episode, a warthog retrieval mission goes awry. Meet the matriarch of Imire, a wonderful elephant that has a unique story. It’s time to say farewell to the Imire family.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: Keanu and Gard meet Tim Ellis. A young CEO, Tim is the founder of Relativity Space, the company that built and launched the world’s first 3D printed rocket.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: Keanu and Gard are given unprecedented access to one of the world’s most guarded artworks: James Turrell’s Roden Crater. Inside the volcanic crater, the art explores the use of light and the cosmos.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: Keanu and Gard meet Omar Bailey, a shoe designer revolutionizing sneaker culture. Omar’s FCTRY LAb has created innovative shoes for musicians and athletes. Now, he’ll create a boot inspired by ARCH.

programme.title: Ainsley Eats The Streets
programme.desc: As winter draws to a close, the Atlantic springs back to life. Fish that spent the winter out in the deeper water have returned. An eagle pair has set up home high above the perfect fishing spot.

programme.title: Ainsley Eats The Streets
programme.desc: Summer means food is plentiful and this year's youngsters must feed, grow and prepare to start life alone. For puffins it's a massive leap of faith as they jump from their cliff-top nests into the ocean.

programme.title: Leguizamo Does America
programme.desc: Mena explores his Canadian backyard, discovering delicious plant-based sushi, pistachio cannolis, and pizza; he gets hands-on at a vegan cheese factory with comedian Bassem Youssef.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: In a frenzy of mezcal and spice, Mena devours a host of local delicacies: plant-based seafood, agua chile and classic enfrijoladas. Later, Mena joins a local abuela to make traditional moles.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: Deep in the heart of Texas is a vegan oasis; Mena explores the off-beat Texan Capitol's surprising plant-based bounty: fried chicken, larger-than-life biscuits, short rib baos and mouth-watering vegan brisket.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: Oscar-winner Kate Winslet, known for Titanic, is celebrated for her versatile, intense performances in both Hollywood blockbusters and indie films, cementing her as one of the finest actors of her generation.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: Everyone thinks they know Harrison Ford. They know the adventurous Nazi-fighting archaeologist and the Blade Runner from a dystopian future. But nobody really knows the man behind the movies once the cameras have stopped rolling.

programme.title: Iceland: The Puffin Sanctuary
programme.desc: Bruce Willis became a star with his iconic role as John McClane in Die Hard, leading to a legendary career with over 100 films. Known for his charm and humor, his career faced a tragic setback in 2022.

programme.title: Costa Rica: The Rise Of Nature
programme.desc: Meet some late-life lovers and explore the reasons behind their sexual longevity and their ability to reproduce well into their later years.

programme.title: Costa Rica: The Rise Of Nature
programme.desc: What does it take to maintain alpha status as animals grow older? We investigate the responsibilities and challenges that come with being a senior leader of a pack.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: We explore the integral role that older animals play in their communities and investigate how animals learn over the course of their lives.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Human, plant, animal, bacteria, all have one inevitable thing in common; death. In this episode we discover the ways in which aging animals defy our usual understanding of the circle of life.

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Burning Blood
programme.desc: Narcotics squad members—Tai Hua, Lao Mi, Ah Feng, and Ah Tang—are involved in arresting a drug lord. However, a betrayal within the police leads to the deaths of Ah Feng and his superior, while Ah Tang vanishes. As Tai Hua and Lao Mi uncover the truth, they find themselves torn between loyalty and betrayal in their fight against the drug cartel.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Embark on the journey with two Thai artistes, Gun and Ticha, as they navigate the bustling city life and discover the serene outskirts of Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Iron Kung Fu Fist
programme.desc: Liang Kun is a skilled martial arts master who left the martial arts world to protect his lover. However, his disappearance leads to her tragic death and as Liang Kun finds a way to survive in the martial arts world, he fights back to avenge his lover’s death with the help of a beggar gang leader.

programme.title: Maoshan Heavenly Master
programme.desc: Prisoner Chi flees away under Master Zhang’s custody, causing the latter to be expelled from his clan. On his way to find Chi, Master Zhang arrives at a place where many people vanish for no reason. He soon discovers that it is Chi who captures them in his training to become a serpent demon. The war between human and demon has just begun!

programme.title: Earth Sweepers

programme.desc: Ni'Cola Mitchell, successful author, realises at a book signing that her calling is to help disadvantaged girls. She launches Girls Who Brunch, to make young women feel seen and empowered.

programme.title: Theresa Caputo: Raising Spirits (S1)

programme.title: 1,000 Ways to Dine
programme.desc: Dining al-fresco hits new levels as host Michael Yo takes us on a tour of truly unique outdoor dining experiences - like noshing on Kampung-style food while seated in the middle of a river.

programme.title: Ang Lihim ni Antonio
programme.desc: Antonio is a curious fifteen-year-old boy who is beginning to come to terms with his own sexuality. A shocking tragedy begins to spiral up as Antonio meets his hedonistic uncle Jonbert.

programme.title: Sundo
programme.desc: Romano sees ghosts. But he sees ghost only around people who will soon encounter sudden, tragic deaths. Romano, Louella, and Isabel now face the biggest fight of their lives.

programme.title: Biyernes Santo
programme.desc: A father takes his daughter, who is traumatized by demon attacks, in a rest house in time for holy week. He enlists the help of his spiritual healer cousin to protect her from evil.

programme.title: Apat Dapat, Dapat Apat
programme.desc: Four women who swear to be friends forever, become domestic helpers when they go over to another country.

programme.title: Kumakasa, Lumalaban
programme.desc: Of all the things in the world, there are two that Reden loves the most: guns and women. The former he uses for self-defense, and the latter, for recreation. As cops probe into a case, Reden meets Divine who has just arrived from the States. Though modern in many ways, her values remain conservative.

programme.title: Ben Delubyo
programme.desc: After his dismissal from the police force due to insubordination, Ben (Bong Revilla, Jr.) decides to lead a quiet life as a mechanic. But just as he is beginning to enjoy his new-found peace, his hometown is beleaguered by crimes. To help contain the problems before they are blown into unimaginable proportions, a PNP general orders a police lieutenant (Charlene Gonzales) to get him back. Indeed, he returns, but this time, as a vigilante. Ironically, his most important assignment is to collar a notorious drug lord (Ronaldo Valdez) who happens to be the father of his girlfriend (Aileen Damiles). Now, Ben is torn between protecting the woman he loves or upholding the law.

programme.title: Nilalang
programme.desc: Nilalang tackles the underbelly of corrupt Philippine cops with the Japanese 'Yakuza' and its links to a centuries' old curse that may be responsible for the spate of serial killings happening in Manila.

programme.title: This Guy's in Love with U Mare
programme.desc: This Guy's in Love with U Mare is about an unlikely love triangle. Starring Vice Ganda, Luis Manzano and Toni Gonzaga.

programme.title: Hello, Universe!
programme.desc: Ariel (Janno Gibbs), a middle-aged man full of regrets, gets another chance to rewrite his past when he meets a magical figure who gives him the life he has always dreamt of. But at what cost?

programme.title: Anong Ganap?
programme.desc: Being in on the entertainment circle is quick and easy on PBO's Anong Ganap? Presented by the gorgeous entertainment anchor ng bayan, Phoemela Baranda.

programme.title: Girlfriend Na Pwede Na
programme.desc: Pam (Kim Molina), having been dumped by her long-time boyfriend, hires Isko (Jerald Napoles), to pretend to be her new boyfriend so to make her ex jealous.

programme.title: Revirginized
programme.desc: Carmela (Sharon Cuneta) gets to enjoy life again in a wild beach party. With young people and a hunk tattoo artist, she drowns herself in alcohol to forget her current self and renew her old self.

programme.title: My Bakit List
programme.desc: Bombarded with so much why's in her life, Dess (Louise delos Reyes) embarks on a soul searching journey. Unknown to her, she is about to face the biggest why of her life when she accidentally bumps into her ex-boyfriend who left her without any explanation.

programme.title: The Nanny S1 E22 - I Don't Remember Mama
programme.desc: Fran Fine turns up on the doorstep of Maxwell Sheffield and finds herself the nanny of Maxwell's three children: Maggie, Brighton, and Grace. Maxwell Sheffield is unhappy about it at first, but Fran turns out to be just what he and his family needed.

programme.title: Law & Order Special Victims Unit S12 E23 - Delinquent
programme.desc: The Special Victims Unit, a specially trained squad of dedicated detectives in the NYPD, who investigate these vicious felonies. These are their stories.

programme.title: CSI S5 E16 - Big Middle
programme.desc: Some provocative episodes from Season 5 of CSI involve Russian mail order brides ("Nesting Dolls"), infantism ("King Baby"), and the Mexican lifestyle of narcocorrido ("Snakes"). From the creative storytelling ("4x4") to the macabre ("Who Shot Sherlock?"), there’s something in Season 5 for everyone. The CSI team investigates many crimes that hit close to home as well. Grissom comes under fire from Ecklie ("Mea Culpa"), Brass tracks down his estranged daughter ("Hollywood Brass"), and during the course of the season Greg Sanders completes his transition from the lab to the field. Last, but not least, Season 5 wraps with an amazing two-part episode ("Grave Danger"), written and directed by Quentin Tarantino, where Nick comes face to face with death while the team exhausts all its resources to same him.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: GRAND SUMO Highlights
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from January 16, Day 6 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Tokyo.

programme.title: Sumopedia
programme.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Today's Close-Up
programme.desc: Dig deeper into current affairs. Cutting-edge information and critical analysis on important issues confronting Japanese lives.

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Asakawa Chieko develops innovative products that transform the lives of the visually impaired. Asakawa, who is blind herself, introduces her greatest project yet: an AI suitcase.

programme.title: IMPACTS: Climates Change the World
programme.desc: The entire Earth is affected by climate change, occurring with a greater speed and scale than ever before. This program uses scientific data and the latest findings to raise awareness on its impact.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: Edo's Rush Hour
programme.desc: Edo was a city of waterways. The Yoroi Ferry transported people across the Nihonbashi River, one of its main commercial arteries. For the captain, it was a high-pressure job requiring skill and guts.

programme.title: Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: Two drugs have been approved for their potential to slow the progression of Alzheimer's disease. We look at how they work and report on new findings suggesting a food-derived component may also help.

programme.title: Trailblazers
programme.desc: Artist Suzuki Mai works to promote kumiko, a traditional craft in which small wooden pieces are joined together without the use of nails. We examine how she is interlocking tradition and technology.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Design X Stories
programme.desc: Today's theme: Cleaning. More than a chore, it's a way to calm the mind. Spaces, products, and system designs to encourage cleaning - explore a unique Japanese aesthetic and the potential of cleaning.

Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: La Famille Blaireau-Renard
programme.desc: Edmond is the father of three little badger cubs; all living happily in their sett. One day, he falls in love with Marguerite, a fox! Everything changes when Marguerite and her daughter move into the den; both families now have to find a way to live together in harmony!

programme.title: Bestioles En Questions
programme.desc: As a nature enthusiast, Émilie is very interested in the behaviour of insects and other small creatures. What do ants eat? Why are frogs slimy? Can a tortoise catch a cold? No question goes unasked!

programme.title: Les Métiers
programme.desc: To gain a better understanding of some professions, school children explain jobs to their parents in their own words.

programme.title: Kenda

programme.title: Les 3 Mousquetaires
programme.desc: Charlotte, Olivia, Inès and Isa lead a double life: ordinary girls at court, training in secret to be the best fighters in the kingdom. The 3 Musketeers, that's them! Bound by an unbreakable friendship, they foil plots and protect the king from his enemies.

programme.title: Les 3 Mousquetaires

programme.title: Le Refuge D'Audrey
programme.desc: What do the hairy-nosed wombat, the k?k?p? and the saiga antelope have in common? They are all amongst the rarest animals on Earth. Audrey, age 7, shares her everyday life with them at a wildlife shelter that works to protect species threatened with extinction.

programme.desc: Danger Force and Captain Man get hooked making celebrity "Holla" videos to start raking in cash. But when making celebrity videos turns into a popularity contest, they accidentally send out a "Holla" video that reveals their secret identities.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: When Miss Shapen’s niece, Noelle, comes into town and chooses Jasper over Henry, Henry discovers that Noelle has much bigger plans than just going out to dinner with Jasper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: After discovering contestants on Swellview's Got Talent are losing consciousness, Captain Man and Kid Danger enlist the help of Charlotte and Schwoz in order to find out what is causing the mischief.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo suits up as the Night Ninja one last time to take on the villainous cat named Scratch and his mutant Vampire Fleas. It's a grudge-match fifteen years in the making! But what does it all have to do with Splinter? The final battle begins!

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: No one likes Rod, especially the Turtles! Bishop's former intern keeps trying to kidnap them and steal their mutant blood, but when Rod himself is kidnapped... Mikey is on the case! His first suspect: the mutant-hating Mechazoid maker BISHOP.

programme.title: The Casagrandes

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Worried that Lori may have a new crush, Bobby visits her in college and tries to impress her with his golf skills.

programme.desc: When Lily starts digging to find out why her favorite ice cream truck is selling shaved ice, she uncovers a town-wide conspiracy. // Dirk is wrongfully accused of stealing a Canyon Valley landmark so Min comes out of lawyer retirement to help him.

programme.desc: Pik Pak Boom is a 1988 Filipino anthology comedy film directed by Leroy Salvador and starring Herbert Bautista, Lea Salonga, Lilet, Bing Loyzaga, Regine Velasquez, and Dingdong Avanzado. The film consists of two segments: "Manyika" (lit. 'Doll') and "Banana Q"

programme.title: From the Beautiful Country ep 9
programme.desc: A Sari-Sari original series. Four beauty pageant contestants find themselves prime suspects when another contestant winds up dead. Each girl has her motive, but which one of them did it? And which one will end up with the crown?

programme.title: Carpool ep 4
programme.desc: Carpool' revolves around four individuals whose lives get thrown into chaos after sharing a carpool ride which ended up in a tragic accident. A streak of unfortunate events seemingly taking them down.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 4
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.

programme.desc: Janet and Ian started a simple life together, but will their maried life be as happy as they dreamed to be when both their parents treat each other as enemy?

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 1
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?
